item.title: CVE-2018-6414|2024-08-05T06:01:49.275Z -- hikvision -- ds-2de4xxxw%2Cds-2de5xxxw%2Cds-2de7xxxw
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the web server of some Hikvision IP Cameras allows an attacker to send a specially crafted message to affected devices. Due to the insufficient input validation, successful exploit can corrupt memory and lead to arbitrary code execution or crash the process.
